name: Twin Stick Demo
description:
Hey! Solo indie dev here with a demo for a twinstick shooter. The demo has the player clearing out waves of enemies trying to retrieve a special artifact. My personal record is 9 min 20 seconds, so see if you can beat it.

Controls are in the readme file along with some tips and tricks you can pull off. Currently the game supports mouse & keyboard and Xbox 360 controllers. Let me know what you think, and good luck!
